feed_id.description: ID of the Sekoia.io feed to get data from

batch_size_limit.description: Size of the batch of elements to get from the Sekoia.io feed in one time

modified_after.description: Date from which IOCs should be retrieved. It must be a valid RFC-3339 date-time string (i.e. 2024-04-12T23:20:50.52Z)

description: Get all valid IOCs from Sekoia.io Intelligence feed
name: Feed IOC Consumption

stix_objects_path.description: Filepath of the STIX objects fetched from the collection
